lines.text: What's the matter Bolland, afraid to die?
Damn right I am. But you're scared to live.
Have you ever been in love, Captain? I'm serious, have you?
In wartime you don't fall in love, you make love. You know what I mean?
How 'bout that? Those squareheads can't even shoot straight.
There's only two things that mean anything to me - flying and women.
In any order or both together.
Lady, I belong to the most destructive group of men the world has ever known. That's my work.
